channel.title: uuid on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in uuid on Today I Learned

item.description: That uuids are 128 bits long in uuid v1, only the first 8 hex digits (32 bits) are randomly generated in uuid v4, the entire 128 bits are randomly generated uuid v5 derives all 128 bits deterministically from the hash of a seed uuid and some input bytes See https://www.sohamkamani.com/uuid-versions-explained/
